name: victory-star

effect.sword-shield: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
effect.legends-arceus: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
